applicationId: BOT CLIENT ID HERE, also called application id
syncedServers: INSERT ADDITIONAL SYNCED SERVER ID HERE (delete if only syncing one server)
allowedRoleId: Role ID in main server of users who you want to let add/remove role
allowedRoleName: ***Used for runReverse only, input the ROLE NAME of users who you want to let add/remove role
logChannelId: INSERT LOG CHANNEL ID HERE (must be in server 1)
